school: Agriculture Food Sciences Schl, Veterinary Science School
description: Regulation of feed intake; requirements of animals for energy, protein, vitamins & minerals; clinical symptoms of nutritional deficiencies & toxicities; ration formulation. Australian rangelands, pasture science & grazing animal management; applied nutrition for dairy cattle, sheep, goats, poultry, pigs, horses, dogs & cats.
restricted: Enrolment restricted to Veterinary Science students only
